3: Hearing the soldier shout, the people on the frontline look up as fiery red mechanical clusters zip past the cloudy sky.
The soldiers immediately dispatch troops to shoot at the sky.
Chaofeng Crew, report the casualty count in the city.

The anti-air artillery intercepts most of the airstrikes, but a small number of Corrupted still manage to slip into the city. The guerrilla forces from the Pulao Crew exchange fire with the advancing Corrupted.
This is the Bian Crew. Some defense turrets were destroyed during the airstrikes. Requesting backup. Repeat, requesting backup.

As the defensive barrage falter, the Corrupted on the other side of the bridge advance. They jump off the broken bridge and crumble into pieces from the fall, slowly piling into a path made of mechanical remains.
Defensive line, retreat! Take back the defense turrets!
